review: Hi,for those who are looking for this device, I would like to raise few questions to you before you buy it:1- Why do you need it?2- Do you think the storage capacity of 5.5 GB is enough?3- Did you search for alternative & compare it with this device?4- Is it really worth it to buy it?I have bought this item thinking it is something different than other similar devices but was wrong.the most I hate about it, that you cannot extend the storage capacity.the other thing that I hate about it is you cannot find lots of applications as such as what is available in Android App Market.the most funny part of this device, it doesn't have internet browser...the silly thing here, it has a USB port, but it was made for no use!!!Amazon claim to provide 300+ games and lots of apps on this device, but Amazon did not declare the storage capacity before claiming that.the maximum amount of games and applications you can install does not exceed 15 depends on the size of each application.I highly suggest to give a look into (G-Box Midnight MX2) before buying this device.overall, I do not recommend this device for those who looks for all in one entertainment device.I highly recommend it for those who looks for simple apps.
